title: List Of Prime Ministers Of Spain
snippet: Therefore, it is not clear who the first prime minister was. However, below are the officeholders of this position since 1975. Carlos Arias Navaro, born in December 1908, was a vocal and popular politician, especially during the rule of Francisco Franco. Although he was a moderate leader at the beginning of the transition to democracy, Navaro turned into a hard-liner and was involved in the White Terror, signing many death warrants during the dismantling of the Spanish Republic, earning the name “Butcher of Malaga.” Following the assassination of Luis Carrero Blanco, Navara was appointed Prime minister in 1973, a position he retained during the transition to democracy.
